projects.name: Money Trend
projects.description: Money Trend is a budgeting app where users log their expenses and income by category to keep track of their budget.

projects.name: Birdie Stock App
projects.description: Birdie is a one-stop shop for investment news and stock research.

projects.name: HR System
projects.description: This is a CLI interface that allows companies to view and edit departments, roles, and employees.

projects.name: Employee Directory
projects.description: This is an example employee directory where you can search for employees or sort them by last name.

projects.name: Fitness Tracker
projects.description: This is an app where you can track your workouts and see the change in weight/duration over time.

projects.name: PWA Transaction App
projects.description: This is a progressive web app (works offline) that tracks finanical transactions and visualizes them.
